resources.name: USER-INVITE
resources.description:
# REQUEST RESPONSES
### FROM HEADER PARAMS
 - 400 : MISSING READER DATA
 - 401 : UNAUTHORIZED

# FULL MODELS INTERFACES
https://github.com/muvirtua/api/blob/main/src/models/types/InterfacesAndEnums.ts
 
 
 # SUCCESS RESPONSE OBJECT
 ```
{
  "invite": {
    "profiles": [
      "admin",
      "moderator"
    ],
    "_id": "5feb5d1ae919a96d849abcd9",
    "contractorId": "5fc15e672beea1406872ba9e",
    "name": "julio souza",
    "email": "juliocnsouzadev@gmail.com",
    "createdAt": "2020-12-29T16:45:14.230Z",
    "__v": 0
  },
  "email": true
} 
```

resources.name: USERS-LIST
USER-INVITE-ACCEPT
resources.description:
# REQUEST RESPONSES
### FROM HEADER PARAMS
 - 400 : MISSING READER DATA
 - 401 : UNAUTHORIZED
 - 410 : INVITE OR USER NOT FOUND
 - 403 : INVITE ALREADY ACCEPTED

# FULL MODELS INTERFACES
https://github.com/muvirtua/api/blob/main/src/models/types/InterfacesAndEnums.ts
 
 
 # SUCCESS RESPONSE OBJECT
 ```
 {
  "invite": {
    "profiles": [
      "admin",
      "moderator"
    ],
    "_id": "5feb72a8d3cfc375acfd01c7",
    "contractorId": "5fc15e672beea1406872ba9e",
    "name": "julio js",
    "email": "juliocnsouza.js@gmail.com",
    "createdAt": "2020-12-29T18:17:12.253Z",
    "__v": 0,
    "acceptedAt": "2020-12-29T19:22:09.882Z"
  },
  "redirectToChangePassword": true
}
 ```

resources.name: SIGNUP
resources.description:
# REQUEST RESPONSES
 - 200 : SUCCESS
 - 403 : CONTRACTOR ALREADY EXISTS
 - 410 : PLAN NOT FOUD
 - 500 : DATA STRUCTURE ISSUES

# FULL MODELS INTERFACES
https://github.com/muvirtua/api/blob/main/src/models/types/InterfacesAndEnums.ts
 
 # REQUEST OBJECT
 ```
 {
   "user":{
      "name":"Julio Mercenary",
      "email":"julio@mercenarysquad.com",
      "password":"AAAAA"
   },
   "contractor":{
      "personType":"JURIDICA",
      "addresses":[
         {
            "type":"MAIN",
            "cep":"80300-000",
            "state":"PR",
            "city":"Curitiba",
            "address":"Rua XPTO",
            "number":"12",
            "complement":"casa",
            "neighbourhood":"Green Ville"
         }
      ],
      "fullName":"Mercenaries Desenvolvimento de Sistemas ltda",
      "nickname":"Mercenary Squad",
      "document":"31758509000121",
      "constacts":[
         {
            "name":"Julio Mercenary",
            "email":"julio@mercenarysquad.com",
            "phone":"(99)99999-9999",
            "type":"PROFILE_RESPONSABLE"
         }
      ]
   },
   "planId":"5fc159e4b339a2433c0c1518"
}
 ```
 
 # SUCCESS RESPONSE OBJECT
 ## USER LOGGED DATA WITH TOKEN IN PLACE OF THE PASSWORD
 ```
 {
  "name": "Julio Mercenary",
  "email": "julio@mercenarysquad.com",
  "password": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1aWQiOiJqdWxpb0BtZXJjZW5hcnlzcXVhZC5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE2MDY1MDgxMzYsImV4cCI6MTYwNjU5NDUzNn0.GfyguPq_dP97RfS210tGytaVIOvXknSwFXT7-Srkh_A",
  "createdAt": "2020-11-27T20:15:35.972Z"
}
 ```
